definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
Qu Yuan Memorial Hall in Zigui county 秭歸縣|秭归县[Zi3 gui1 Xian4], Hubei, built in 1982 and a major tourist attraction since then

sentences.english: The courtyard of the National 228 Memorial Museum.
sentences.chinese: 二二八國家紀念館庭院廣場。

sentences.english: The building is a commemoration of the battle of Waterloo.
sentences.chinese: 這座房子是滑鐵盧戰役紀念館。

sentences.english: This Italian war memorial was just a few km's from the Austrian boarder.
sentences.chinese: 這是離奧地利邊界僅僅幾公里遠的意大利戰爭紀念館。

sentences.english: They sent it to the Australian War Memorial for analysis.
sentences.chinese: 他們把金屬送到澳大利亞陣亡將士紀念館做分析。

sentences.english: This is Zhang Baogao Memorial Hal.
And hope is what Yad Vashem is all about!
sentences.chinese: 而盼望正是大屠殺紀念館的主旨。

sentences.english: Hebei-Shandong-Henan border revolutionary memorial hall is located in Heze city near the Zhao Wang river.
sentences.chinese: 冀魯豫邊區革命紀念館位於菏澤市城區趙王河畔。

sentences.english: We visited The Liaoshen Campaign Memorial Hall at first.
sentences.chinese: 一行成員首先參觀的遼瀋戰役紀念館。

sentences.english: Please tell me the way to the Lincoln Memorial.
sentences.chinese: 請告訴我去林肯紀念館的路。

sentences.english: There is also a "Hundred Regiments " front-line Memorial Hall headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 這裏還建有“百團大戰”前線指揮部紀念館。

sentences.english: Changing of guard at Anit Kabir Mausoleum at Ataturk Monument.
sentences.chinese: 凱末爾紀念館，阿塔圖爾克雕像前的警衛交接班儀式。

sentences.english: Sakamoto Ryoma Museum Curator Shiro Mori pointed out sharply that health.
sentences.chinese: 坂本龍馬紀念館館長森健志郎一針見血地指出。

sentences.english: Eight months ago the water itself prepared the place for it.
sentences.chinese: 八個月前，大水還佔據着現在紀念館的位置。

sentences.english: Memorial Hall of Tao Xingzhi is famous for beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 陶行知紀念館以風景優美著稱。

sentences.english: You must build a memorial that will last through the generations.
sentences.chinese: 你們要建造的必須是能夠代代相傳的紀念館。

sentences.english: In many ways, the museum is a shrine to Pele.
sentences.chinese: 這個博物館在很大程度上就是一個貝利紀念館。

definition: Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Guomintang 國民黨|国民党/same as 孫逸仙|孙逸仙
